CustomField.formula: CASE( LKW_currency__c, "GBP", LKW_Amount__c, "USD", LKW_Amount__c * $CustomMetadata.Currency_rate__mdt.USD_GBP.Conversion_rate__c, "EUR", LKW_Amount__c * $CustomMetadata.Currency_rate__mdt.EUR_GBP.Conversion_rate__c, "AUD", LKW_Amount__c * $CustomMetadata.Currency_rate__mdt.AUD_GBP.Conversion_rate__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: LKW Jump Formula
